modName: Ebony Mail with Pauldrons and Legplates
summary: Makes the ebony mail look exactly like the traditonal ebony armor.  No more missing pauldrons or leg plates.
descriptionHtml:
I thought the ebony mail looked like an incomplete set of armor.  I didn\'t like the other options out there; they are either the same incomplete set with a different color scheme; or they\'re a completelt different lore-breaking mesh.  The ebony mail has always been traditional ebony and it shouldn\'t look like daedric ebony; it\'s the armor of boethia\'s mortal champion, not dagon\'s favorite general.

This is a very simple mod; I didn\'t change anything; I just changed the pathing.  I made it for personal use and I figured I\'d offer it on the nexus for others with similar tastes.  

To install just extract it to your skyrim root directory and press merge and overwrite if necessary.
author: ecremer
